entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ObjectDisposedException from FileConfigurationProvider in net8.0 #96282
  • System.Tests.StringTests failing on windows-arm64 Release NativeAOT_Libraries leg #96279
  • System.Data.Odbc - DbProviderFactories.GetFactory(connection) fails #96278
  • Investigate optimizing some OrderBy().Take calls to use a PriorityQueue #96277
    Future
  • [RISC-V] Undefined Behavior caused by return ulong as uint8 without cast #96276
  • ,NET Core 3.1.32 - ExecuteEngineException (0x80131506) on hostile memory conditions #96275
  • FrozenDictionary.TryGetValue is consistently slower than ConcurrentDictionary.TryGetValue for integer keys #96274
    Future
  • Question about dll resolution in hostfxr #96271
  • TimeZoneInfo.IsInvalidTime(DateTime) returns false for times which don't exist in Samoa Standard Time #96269
  • MethodNotFoundException in net8 #96268
  • `SerialPort.Write()` does not block until all data is written. #96267
  • Incorrect method return on Android in Release mode #96264
  • HttpClient distributed tracing tag enrichment #96263
  • ParallelEnumerable.ToDictionary does not parallelize #96262

Closed

  • [DataTable] Decimal Column Bug, within parallel #96234
  • Backport #72274 Avoid adding an HttpClient.Timeout message to ConnectTimeout exceptions to 6.0 branch #95097
    Future
  • Thread calling CancellationTokenSource.Cancel() continues with another task and after that released task by this thread is never run. #96238
  • Issue when coupling with System.Json.Text source generator #96273
  • `ConcurrentDictionary.TryGetValue` faster than `Dictionary.TryGetValue` #96250
  • Incorrect library-root path => problem with loading CEF-files #12232
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix JSON crashinfo exception object address #96284
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HybridGlobalization] Fix xamarin_macios build after system ICU change #96270
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Remove arm64 neardiffer hack #96266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Set `bbFalseTarget` upon `BBJ_COND` initialization/modification #96265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Add additional help text for superpmi-diffs.yml JIT options #96281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution

Updated

  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • New exception handling diagnostic fixes #96065
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96248
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add option to disable log message queue behavior (performance issue) #96260
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add LoongArch64's SIMD128/256 instructions within emitter. #95456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Intrinsify Interlocked.And and Interlocked.Or on XARCH #96258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Disable partial sharing on wasm. #96255
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove suppression of VSIXCompatibility1001 #71404
  • Null reference exception in code fix provider for IDE0045 #71403
  • Equality operators are offered in completion in lambda expression in extension method when its input type is inaccessible record #71401
  • Roslyn Compilation, 160 errors and process terminated due to NullReferenceException when a class with primary constructor implements INotifyPropertyChanged #71400
  • Dynamic invocation of a local function succeeds unexpectedly when there is a ref kind mismatch for a 'dynamic' argument. #71399

Closed

  • Deadlock in Helix Tasks #71398

PullRequests

Merged

  • Call GetURI when getting a URI for a document #71395
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused enum values #71393
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use iteration type for convertibility of element types #71397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Inline Rename] Update the UI related to Copilot #71332
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • WIP: Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PR feedback and cleanup after solution-state/compilation-state refactoring. #71389
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unit test layering #71376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Features core tests #71394
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes #52975
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plaintext #52974
  • Adding Roles to a Blazor Web project does not work #52970
  • [Infrastructure] Update NPM dependencies as part of build-ops #52966
  • [Infrastructure] JS infrastructure next steps #52965
  • [Blazor] Modernize and Centralize our JS build infrastructure #52964
  • [Blazor] Centralize JS dependencies #52963
  • In ASP.NET 8, IReadOnlyCollection<> controller parameters do not bind from request body by default #52962
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot #52958

Closed

  • Perf improvement: mvc #52950
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #52957
  • Update QuickGrid virtualization sample to remove TODO to use @bind:after #52004
    9.0-preview1
  • Build fails with node 20 #48146
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Unhandled exception when running new Blazor Web App from following tutorial at https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/aspnet/blazor-tutorial/intro #52680
  • In Dmain Driven Design (DDD) , Should be use the IRepository contract in the application layer or in the domain layer? #51511
    Discussions
  • [Feature] Generate multiple Razor Pages css isolation bundles #52927
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #52951
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #52941
  • Web Farm with IIS10 Servers | Content Server: HTTP Error 500.0 - ASP.NET Core IIS hosting failure (in-process) #51764
  • Static file change during build causes browser refresh failure #39062
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Virtualize + CSS Snap scrolls uncontrollably on Chromium-based browsers #30203
    Planning: WebUI
  • Investigate behavior of Blazor Server on mobile when switching apps #26985
    Planning: WebUI
  • Publish Blazor wasm hosted with x64 Platform on the server results in RuntimeIdentifier compatibility exception #43749
    Planning: WebUI
  • Missing TypeCheck in generated razor class in case of CreateInferredEventCallback #28949
    Planning: WebUI
  • FocusAsync does not focus on input on initial load on Chrome / Edge but does on Firefox #33447
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Server with OpenIdConnect authentication fails when trying to sign out #51702
    Planning: WebUI
  • @onchange not bubbling in Blazor #34758
    Planning: WebUI
  • Graph demo component/controller in the hosted WASM project template? #45394
    Planning: WebUI
  • Support HostedServices in Blazor #7213
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52973
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52972
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52971
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 8.0.x
  • Use an image w/ node for SourceBuild #52969
    area-infrastructure
  • Reenable HTTPs tests #52967
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `530d5c8` to `cde9a74` #52961
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix component governance alerts #52954
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Infrastructure] Cleanups from the move to NPM #52959
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Test failure] Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.FunctionalTests.StartupTests.WrongApplicationPath_FailedToRun #52890
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [Infrastructure] Move back to NPM #52914
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix app_offline detection for some OSes #52810
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Net7 and Net8 Android projects with AndroidLibrary try to generate binding instead of add it as reference like Xamarin project does #19569
  • GraphicsView does not change the Background/BackgroundColor on Android #19568
  • [UItest] Windows Device Tests don't appear to be running full set of categories #19565
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Adding buttons to the title bar #19564
  • [testing] Run tests iOS and Android emulator tests on Hosted machines #19561
    Backlog
  • Shadow does not honour Styles #19560
  • Resizetizer generates incorrect images #19557
  • Android Systemfonts (light/black etc.) not working #19556
  • can't compile on vs for Mac with .net 8 due to missing supporting packages #19555
  • How to start a single UI test from the command line? #19554
  • Can't run the application on physical iOS device #19553
  • Numeric Keyboard NEEDS to have a close keypad or DONE button on it like the Return on the full keyboard. Android has it, iOS does not. #19550
  • If Maui use Shell, in android ,control cannot be placed at the top with immersive statusbar #19549

Closed

  • Null reference for jsRuntime in .net MAUI app with BlazorWebView #13293
  • Maui Preferences always thows exception while using datatype other than string. #17858
  • [UITEst] Windows Controls Unpackaged occasionally crashes with IndexOutOfRangeException #19463
    Backlog
  • UriImageSource and dependencies #13309
    Backlog
  • Maui SkiaSharp GetPoints Cause App Crash Intermittently in iPad. #19558
  • [Windows] No Property to hide 'Switch' Label #19551
  • Appended ToolbarHandler mapper action not called on iOS #16467
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Attach And Run iOS / catalyst semantic tests #19571
  • Add buttons to copy error messages and stack traces to the test runner #19566
  • [X] GetValueSource #19563
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • Fix attribute typo #19567
  • Grab device logs if app stops running #19562
  • Disable flaky compat test #19546
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-flakiness, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Break `ControlsHeadlessTestRunner.RunTestsAsync` method when discovering tests #19559
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing, testing-flakiness

Updated

  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, stale
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • Clean up async assertions #19385
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
